message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper deals with action recognition from wearable cameras, which is a topic that falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed approach involves joint encoding of appearance and motion features, which is a common problem in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of optical flow, which is a common technique in multimedia (cs.MM) research. Finally, the paper proposes a self-supervised block, which is a technique that is often used in robotics (cs.RO) research.
